trans-unit.source: however, SetWindowText sets the text for the control, not for the list box entries. To set the text of a

To set the text of a

target.mrk: however, SetWindowText sets the text for the control, not for the list box entries.
To set the text of a

trans-unit.source: control in another process, send the $WM_SETTEXT message directly instead of calling SetWindowText.
